channel.title: this WEEK in TECH - MP3 Edition
channel.description: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital technology. Winner of the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award for best overall podcast and Best Technology Podcast. Released every Sunday at midnight Pacific.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.3.2(1632); Mac OS X Version 10.6.8 (Build 10K549) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital tech.
channel.itunes:summary: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech. Winner of People's Choice Podcast and Best Technology Podcast in the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Awards. Released every Sunday at midnight Pacific.
channel.itunes:keywords: twit, techtv, leo laporte, kevin rose, patrick norton, john c. dvorak

item.title: TWiT 356: The Fifth Leg Of The Stool
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, Doc Searles, John C. Dvorak, and Rafe Needleman.

Windows 8 secret moves, cyberwarfare, Jobs domination of All Things D, bad Facebook ads, maps wars, Muppet market, return of Dragon, and more.

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/twit.

For additional show notes, visit the wiki page for this episode. Links to stories we covered (and then some) are available from Delicious or in our Friendfeed Room.

Audio bandwidth for This Week in Tech is provided by the new Winamp for Android... featuring wireless sync and one-click iTunes import. Now with FREE daily music downloads and full length CD listening parties. Download it for free at Winamp.com/Android.

Running time: 01:55:31
